title: Assateague Island National Seashore: Ranger Guided Programs
body: Ranger Guided Programs         Become a marine explorer and discover what lives in the water at Assateague! Krystina Carpenter  A variety of ranger guided programs are available to encourage visitors of all ages to enjoy and learn more about the barrier island environment.      Program Schedules Maryland District Program Schedule 2016 Centennial Activities August 7-13, 2016 (pdf file 286 kb) August 14 - 20, 2016 (pdf file 286 kb)   Maryland District Assateague Island Visitor Center 11800 Marsh View Lane Berlin, MD 21811 410-641-1441 (press 1)   Virginia District Program Schedule August 7 - August 13, 2016 (pdf file, 1.47 Mb) August 14 - August 20, 2016 (pdf file, 1.1 Mb) Astronomy & Night Sky Summer Series: July 14 & 21, August 12, 2016 (pdf file, 1.4kb) Piecing Together a Changing Climate Art Show Opening Reception, August 15, 2016 (pdf file, 498 kb) Virginia District Toms Cove Visitor Center 8586 Beach Road Chincoteague, VA 23336 410-641-1441 (press 2)              Calendar   Visit our Calendar to search for special events.        Centennial Special Events   We've got a line up of special events to help celebrate the National Park Service's Centennial. Join the birthday party!
